asset.author: Hoover
asset.hookText:
Do you love your kids and pets but need something that can really clean the seen and "unseen" pet hair and debris? We have what you need to get at the stubborn pet hair and get deep down cleaning with the Hoover® WindTunnel® 3 Pro Pet Bagless Upright Vacuum. It's designed with exclusive WindTunnel® 3 Technology that lifts and removes deep-down, embedded dirt with 3 channels of suction. 

If you have any questions, contact us on Facebook.com/Hoover, tweet us @HooverUsa, or give us a call at 888-679-2121.

Link to this video: http://youtu.be/abS92UUsseY
